where PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TPAM_CUP_QRC_TXN_INFO set PAGY_PAY_TXN_TM = #{pagyPayTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAGY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_TXN_TM = #{pagyTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pagySysSoaNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAGY_SYS_SOA_VERSION = #{pagySysSoaVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_SYS_SOA_ACTION_FLAG = #{pagySysSoaActionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAGY_MCHT_NO = #{pagyMchtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_PAGY_NO = #{tpamPagyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_CHANNEL_NO = #{tpamChannelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_SETL_MODEL = #{tpamSetlModel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tpamTokenPayLimitCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_RISK_INFO = #{tpamRiskInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_BACKEND_URL = #{pagyBackendUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_TXN_START_TM = #{tpamTxnStartTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_TXN_EXPIRE_TM = #{tpamTxnExpireTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_COUPONIFO = #{tpamCouponifo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_BANK_NO = #{tpamBankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_BANK_TXN_TM = #{tpamBankTxnTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_COM_INFO = #{tpamComInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_SETTLE_KEY = #{tpamSettleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_TXN_NO = #{tpamTxnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_ORIG_TXN_AMT = #{tpamOrigTxnAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_TXN_AMT = #{tpamTxnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TPAM_STLM_DT = #{tpamStlmDt,jdbcType=CHAR}, TPAM_STLM_TM = #{tpamStlmTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_LOCALHOST_IP = #{updLocalhostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_TRACE_ID = #{sysTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_CRT_TM = #{pagyCrtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAGY_UP_TM = sysdate where PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.TXN_REQ_SSN,b.TXN_REQ_TM,b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_SSN,b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_TM,b.PROD_ID,b.TXN_TYPE from TPAM_CUP_QRC_TXN_INFO a left join PAGY_TXN_INFO b on a.pagy_txn_ssn=b.pagy_txn_ssn left join PAY_ORDER_INFO c on a.pagy_txn_ssn=c.PAGY_TXN_SSN where a.PAGY_RESP_CODE in ('0000','0002') and to_char(a.PAGY_TXN_TM,'YYYYMMDD')=#{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.order_type='0'
